com.facebook.buck.rules.query

Class GraphEnhancementQueryEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.query.GraphEnhancementQueryEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryEnvironment

    public class GraphEnhancementQueryEnvironment
extends Object
implements QueryEnvironment
    A query environment that can be used for graph-enhancement, including macro expansion or dynamic dependency resolution. The query environment supports the following functions 
      attrfilter
  deps
  inputs
  except
  intersect
  filter
  kind
  set
  union
    This query environment will only parse literal targets or the special macro '$declared_deps', so aliases and other patterns (such as ...) will throw an exception. The $declared_deps macro will evaluate to the declared dependencies passed into the constructor.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getTransitiveClosure

        public Set<QueryTarget> getTransitiveClosure(Set<QueryTarget> targets)
                                      throws QueryException,
                                             InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: QueryEnvironment
        Returns the forward transitive closure of all of the targets in "targets". Callers must ensure that QueryEnvironment.buildTransitiveClosure(java.util.Set<com.facebook.buck.query.QueryTarget>, int, com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListeningExecutorService) has been called for the relevant subgraph.
        Specified by:
        getTransitiveClosure in interface QueryEnvironment

        InterruptedException

      • buildTransitiveClosure

        public void buildTransitiveClosure(Set<QueryTarget> targetNodes,
                                   int maxDepth,
                                   com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListeningExecutorService executor)
                            throws InterruptedException,
                                   QueryException
        Description copied from interface: QueryEnvironment
        Construct the dependency graph for a depth-bounded forward transitive closure of all nodes in "targetNodes". The identity of the calling expression is required to produce error messages.

        If a larger transitive closure was already built, returns it to improve incrementality, since all depth-constrained methods filter it after it is built anyway.

        Specified by:
        buildTransitiveClosure in interface QueryEnvironment
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        QueryException
